name: StyleHelper
description: A wrapper for Minecraft's text styling system, providing access to text formatting properties including colors, font styles, click events, and hover effects.
overview: The StyleHelper class serves as a bridge between JSMacros scripts and Minecraft's internal text styling capabilities. It is typically obtained from text components through methods like TextHelper.visit() or used with TextBuilder.withStyle() to apply styling to text elements. StyleHelper instances contain the complete styling information for a text segment, allowing for detailed inspection and manipulation of text appearance.

methods.name: hasColor
methods.description: Checks if the style has a specific color defined.

methods.name: getColorIndex
methods.description: Gets the Minecraft formatting code index for the color.

methods.name: getColorValue
methods.description: Gets the RGB integer value of the color. Returns -1 if no color value is present.

methods.name: getColorName
methods.description: Gets the name of the color (e.g., 'red', 'blue').

methods.name: hasCustomColor
methods.description: Checks if the style uses a custom RGB color rather than a standard Minecraft color code.

methods.name: getCustomColor
methods.description: Gets the integer value of the custom RGB color.

methods.name: getFormatting
methods.description: Returns a FormattingHelper instance providing additional formatting information.

methods.name: bold
methods.description: Checks if the text is formatted as bold.

methods.name: italic
methods.description: Checks if the text is formatted as italic.

methods.name: underlined
methods.description: Checks if the text is formatted as underlined.

methods.name: strikethrough
methods.description: Checks if the text is formatted with a strikethrough.

methods.name: obfuscated
methods.description: Checks if the text is obfuscated (random changing characters).

methods.name: getClickAction
methods.description: Gets the action type of the click event (e.g., 'run_command', 'open_url').

methods.name: getClickValue
methods.description: Gets the value associated with the click event (e.g., the URL or command).

methods.name: getCustomClickValue
methods.description: Gets the custom value associated with the click event if present.

methods.name: getHoverAction
methods.description: Gets the action type of the hover event (e.g., 'show_text').

methods.name: getHoverValue
methods.description: Gets the content of the hover event. Can return complex objects depending on the content type.

methods.name: getInsertion
methods.description: Gets the text string to be inserted into the chat input when shift-clicked.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the style instance.
